alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade and central Pennington Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 502 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of New Underwood, or 17 miles east of Rapid City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Viewfield around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Curlew Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 69 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
